subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: Due to {{w|Han unification}}, the {{w|Traditional Chinese|traditional form}} containing <font size=4.5, lang="zh-hant">[[呂]]</font> and {{w|Simplified Chinese|simplified form}} containing <font size=4.5, lang="zh-hans">[[吕]]</font> are encoded under the same [[code point]]. Depending on the font installed, this character may appear to be either <font size=4.5, lang="zh-hant">莒</font> or <font size=4.5, lang="zh-hans">莒</font>.
